title: Did President Trump Plagiarize His Commencement Speech from ‘Legally Blonde’?
subtitle: Snippets of a commencement address delivered by Trump have been compared to snippets of a scene in the Reese Witherspoon film.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A commencement speech delivered by President Trump at Liberty University in May 2017 bore remarkable similarities to one given by Reese Witherspoon's character in the 2001 film "Legally Blonde."
